alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:28PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Campbell County through 500 PM MDT... At 427 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Recluse, or 28 miles northwest of Gillette, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Recluse around 435 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
